description:
This class will start with analysing a website of a (life/business) coach in New York. We analyse how this website ended up on top of the Google search results.

This class consists of 5 video's:

  1. Google search results: How to customize
  2. Where to put your keywords
  3. Keyword research
  4. Summary of all the knowledge
  5. Last example of a filmmaker containing:
  • a keyword research
  • examples of putting in your keywords
  • making a custom search result.

There will also be a compact SEO basiscs reader available.

At the end of the class the students should be able to do a keyword research. You can upload your keyword research and show them to the other students. So everybody learns and can give tips.

I might ask a few students to take their website as an example in my new course that will be more in-depth.
title: SEO: keyword research and adding keywords to your website
